note.p: References: John H Appleby, 'Robert Dingley, FRS (1710-1781), Merchant, Architect and Pioneering Philanthropist' in NR 1991 vol 45 pp 139-154

Notes: Note on his certificate regarding his admittance to the Society. According to his signature on Cert II, 189, he was "AUGUSTAE RUSSARUM IMPERATRICIS Generalis Locumtenens Copiarum bellicarum, Camerarius ordinarius, Ordinum Equestrium Aquiae albae et S Alexandri Eques, Regiae Societati Anglicanae"
